alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:53AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Aitkin, southern St. Louis and northern Carlton Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Virginia, to near Cotton, to near Canyon, to near Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to near Tamarack, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canyon around 100 AM CDT. Biwabik around 105 AM CDT. Cloquet, Aurora, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area and Saginaw around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Scanlon, Boulder Lake, Hoyt Lakes, Mahtowa, Wolf Lake, Island Lake, Pike Lake Near Duluth, Hermantown, Proctor, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, City of Rice Lake, Brimson, Carlton, Wrenshall and Thomson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore
